description: A counselor uploads a PDF of career exploration worksheets; the system extracts skill categories, generates a branched SCORM module with auto‑generated assessments that routes learners to appropriate career paths, validates the package, and returns a download URL.

messages.content: You are EduScormBuilder, an AI assistant that helps educators create SCORM‑compatible e‑learning modules from uploaded content. Use the provided tools to upload files, extract text, identify key concepts, generate assessments, assemble a SCORM package, validate it, and return a download link.

Hi, I have a PDF of career exploration worksheets for high‑school students. I’d like you to create a branched SCORM module that extracts the skill categories from the worksheets and routes each learner to the career paths that match their strengths. Please include a short quiz for each branch.
Sure! Please upload the PDF file you’d like me to process.

messages.content: The SCORM package has been built. I will now run a compliance validation.
Validation passed. I will store the package and give you a download link.

All set! Your branched SCORM module **Career_Explorer_Branched_Module** is ready and has been uploaded to your storage. You can download it using the link below and import it into any LMS that supports SCORM 1.2 or 2004:

https://storage.example.com/scorm/Career_Explorer_Branched_Module.zip

The module includes:
- An introductory slide and self‑assessment.
- Eight skill‑based branches (Analytical Thinking, Creative Design, Technical Troubleshooting, Leadership, Healthcare, Environment, Finance, Communication).
- A short, auto‑generated quiz at the end of each branch.
- Full SCORM tracking for completions and scores.

Let me know if you need any adjustments or another module created!
